title: Itextpdf disable change width of outer table while setting paddings for nested tables/cells
body: While working with itextpdf library I have to create nested tables with some content but it leads to decreasing width of outer table, I also set some padding parameters like paddingTop/paddingBottom for the nested table default cell. So the question is: how to disable decreasing width of the outer table when it contains nested table with configured paddings.
